text: "I Belong to You" is a 1998 song by Lenny Krativz and is the third single from his fifth studio album 5. It went to number 71 in the United States and number 75 in the United Kingdom but went to number 36 on the Billboard Mainstream Top 40 chart. ==Track listing== The single featured several remixes for his previous single "If You Can't Say No", apart from the "I Belong to You" song. # "I Belong to You" – 4:17 # "If You Can't Say No" (Flunky in the Attic Mix) – 5:16 # "If You Can't Say No" (Just Say No Mix) – 6:00 # "If You Can't Say No" (BT Twilo Dub) – 8:02 # "If You Can't Say No" (Dallas Austin Mix) – 4:45 UK edition # "I Belong to You" – 4:17 # "If You Can't Say No" (Flunky in the Attic Mix) – 5:16 # "If You Can't Say No" (BT Twilo Dub) – 8:02 ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Reggae songs Category:Lenny Kravitz songs
title: I Belong to You (Lenny Kravitz song)
